import React, {useState} from "react" import {Route, Switch, Redirect, useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' import Logo from './Logo' import Home from './routes/Home' import Plants from './routes/Plants' import Recipes from './routes/Recipes' import MenuContainer from './MenuContainer' import Search from './routes/Search' import './App.css'; import { library } from '@fortawesome/fontawesome-svg-core' import { fab } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons' import axios from "axios" import AppContext from "./Context" library.add(fab) function App() { const BASE_URL = 'http://sweetolivefarms.com/wp-json/wp/v2' const [searchData, setSearchData] = useState(); let history = useHistory(); async function search(formData){ let searchTerm = formData.search; let res = await axios.get(`${BASE_URL}/posts?search=${searchTerm}`) let data = res.data; setSearchData(data); history.push('/search') }; return (
); } export default App;
